website_summaries.verdict: A pair of sunglasses make this pack of readers a good buy. Their bright colors and sturdy construction make them a solid pick.
pros: The standard readers come in five different colors, and the pack also features a pair of reader sunglasses
They are sturdy, with spring hinges for comfort
cons: Lenses are sometimes scratched upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong for less than $3 bucks a pair. Even if they last a short time. I keep my reading glasses all over the house. This is a good deal. Better than the $ store kind. I like that they include a pair of sun readers for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: CatrineTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Price for some Awesome Readers!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous Price for some Awesome Readers!! I always have glasses on my head, in my purse, on the side table, at my neighbors, etc. THESE READERS WORK!! Fortunately I received six clear pairs all intact (didn't need sunglass readers). Compared them to some Foster Grants I had purchased from Walmart for $10. Same size, same weight (used digital scale, what the heck it was right there on the counter). The only difference no Bedazzling, but Fun Colors. I expect these readers to last as long as all my other plastic readers. 6 pair for what I used to pay for 2. You do the math. God Bless!!
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy attractive Readers!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for inexpensive readers because I leave them everywhere or I drop them. The dollar store ones just didn't seem like they were working so I thought I'd give these a try. The price point was great because these are very study and good quality. They are larger than I am used to- like the size of regular glasses but I liked the size. They are very attractive and I like the gold detail on the arm of the glasses. I keep one in my bedside table, one in my office and one in my purse. I would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Update...not such a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Glasses were delivered quickly, optics are good and colors are as shown. I recommend this product. Update 12/5/15 I am down to 2 pairs left out of a total of 6. Why? In every case, the screws holding the temples to the lens completely fell out causing the temples to fall off. I've never had this happen before so soon after purchase. Usually this occurs after I've had a pair of glasses for a long time, plus the screw is usually intact so that I can tighten it. The screws completely fell out of all 4 pair of glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I am using the graduation indicated by the specialist and select these lenses because I liked the variety they showed .. I was very satisfied with them ... they are light, the plastic of very good quality and the option of dark color to use as sunglasses It is phenomenal! They come super protected and they arrived sooner than expected ... I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Marleny P.

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are the best thing. Several different styles and what a great price. I accidentally ordered the wrong strength - company was awesome about making it right even after Amazon had posted that returns aren't permitted. This is the second set I have ordered and will again when I misplace these LOL.
customer_reviews.author: German Shepherds

customer_reviews.title: well made... great price
customer_reviews.text: just got these glasses. I'm so impressed with them. first of all, getting 6 pairs of readers for under $10. wow! but even better they are good quality and the side pieces are springed so they give when they are supposed to. that's something's you don't usually see in this price range. they are well packaged and come with a cleaning square and even this is a better quality then would be expected. plus you get a special tool to keep the screws adjusted. the colors are amazing and i want more of them! will get more after the holidays. great product!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses!
customer_reviews.text: My eyes keep changing and this is the third set of these I've ordered. They are as good as any glasses I've ever paid a lot more for. Love the sunglasses that come with and when (hopefully not but aging is inexorable), my eyes change again, I will be buying more of these. Great deal! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: jenatron

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have a small face as I’m very thin but I have to say these seem to be very well made and a most EXCELLENT price! Though they are big/wide on my face I still really like them and will use them. The first couple of times cleaning them was a pain as the microfiber cloth didn’t easily glide over the lenses but it’s gotten better each time.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear lenses in a sturdy frame.
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic readers! I was actually very surprised that they are such good quality for such a cheap price. The lenses are crystal clear and the frames are a good weight. They feel secure and sturdy on my face. I can’t believe that I got 6 pairs for $10 and they aren’t junk! When I lose these or scratch them, as I always do, I will order another set.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are the bomb! I love the sunglasses! The build of the glasses surprised me! I was expecting a lesser quality build but to my surprise, they are well built and feel solid, yet light while wearing them. I can have a pair everywhere I go! The polishing cloth that comes with them is really nice as well!
customer_reviews.author: Lisanne

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on these readers. You get six reading glasses each with a different design and one being sunglass readers, a cleaning cloth and a tool to fix your glasses if need be that you can put on your keychain. Each pair reminds me of the foster grants I got at Walmart for $10.00 each. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pricing, well made
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pricing, well made...disappointment in the frames. Was expecting lighter colors as pictured...the frames are dark giving them a heavier appearance when worn. The sunglasses are a plus...good value.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Bowker

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I normally have a 2.0 reader, but they were out when I purchased these and only had 1.75's...so I thought, for extras around home, that would be fine. I received them this week and couldn't believe the quality and that they were great readers at 1.75...I don't need my 2.0...The also fit perfectly...For $10.00, I just bought for extras around home, but now think I will use these for everyday, everywhere use!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive reading glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great generic but stylish reading glasses. I loved it came with numerous pairs. I can switch them out with what I am wearing for the day. I have had these for quite awhile now and they are holding up nicely. Very pleased with my purchase especially for the price!! I would buy again definitely. Quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Fun and hold up well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to keep at my desk as I seem to always be forgetting my readers and can't see to do my job. I have raced up to CVS so many times for a cheap pair, only to have them fall apart quickly. These are strong for the price and holding up well. I also like having a spare around for others who need them too. The colors and patterns are fun but not too outrageous for a serious corporate job. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: SweetWoodruff

customer_reviews.title: excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Foster Grant readers for about $12.00 a piece. When I saw this item listed for 5 pairs at $10.00, I was reluctant to believe they would be quality readers. I am happy to write that these readers are very attractive and exactly the kind that fits my fashion and optical needs. I highly recommend buying from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these glasses. They are lightweight, but sturdy and well-made, and the lenses are very clear. I love the gold accents - they look cute on, and so much better than the generic readers i have found in stores in the past. I have purchased, worn, lost and regretted many readers over the last several years. Hard to believe these come in a pack of 3 for the price! A great buy and i will definitely keep these on my reorder list!!!
customer_reviews.author: 16VolFan

customer_reviews.title: Great reading glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses at a reasonable price. I bought a few different brands before but these lasted longer and had crystal clear lenses that I could see very well through. I'm hard on my reading glasses and these actually survived my abuse!!!
customer_reviews.author: BCTennessee

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier, great selection of styles at an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier, great selection of styles at an amazing price. The quality is amazing!!!! The sun readers are what I was looking for and I would have paid more for just that pair then I paid for the entire set. I even received a cleaning cloth and a screw driver. I will be ordering another set for my daughter. So happy 😀
customer_reviews.author: isabella

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Just received these and very pleased! I've been through many pairs of drug store reading glasses and have tried different options on Amazon too. These are far and above all of these in quality - solid, well-made, and do not have the same weak points where others have broken. They are clear and comfortable. Patterns/colors are all fun and a couple I'll use for professional meetings. I tried the sunglasses (wouldn't have normally ordered these) and was pleasantly surprised at how effective they are for computer screens, esp in bright light - so will indeed use them. Amazing quality and style at this price!
customer_reviews.author: HoneyB

customer_reviews.title: Great Reading glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love this set of GAMMA RAY READERS Reading Glasses ! They are so much heavier than the ones I purchased at a local grocery store. They are a great quality. The colors are fun but not embarrassing to wear. I love to match my glasses with what I'm wearing that day. Fun and very good reading glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy U

customer_reviews.title: Ladies Gamma Ray Readers 6 Pairs
customer_reviews.text: These glasses have so far lasted me about 2 months and still show no signs of breaking or coming apart. The plastic lenses are clear with no warping and I can see clearly with them. I'm wearing a pair right now and they feel fine on my face and head and they don't make my nose sore or bother me in any way. I like these a lot and will probably be buying more. I haven't yet used the pair with the dark lenses but I expect them to last just as well as the others. The designs are cute and colorful too!
customer_reviews.author: loveguitarTop Contributor: Soap Making

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses you can’t beat the price, I bought these cause I’m always losing my reading glasses and I’m also very hard on my glasses. For the price if I lose one I can just grab another
customer_reviews.author: C. Mitchel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great price
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy with these glasses. I was thinking I may need reading glasses and as soon as I tried them on I knew I must have because I could see what I was reading clearly. Fit comfortably and the price was amazing with so many colors plus the sunglasses 😁
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: very good reading glasses
customer_reviews.text: this is the second time I have purchased these. My wife misplaces them frequently so I ordered a second group. They are well made and look good. I am very pleased and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ross

customer_reviews.title: so be sure you know the correct strength I had to return them and it cost me almost half of what I paid for them to return them which I wasn't happy about.
customer_reviews.text: They were to strong for me, so be sure you know the correct strength I had to return them and it cost me almost half of what I paid for them to return them which I wasn't happy about.
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: How the fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses...they fit right and the strength is perfect. I decided I wanted glasses all throughout the house so if I needed to read something I would have them right where I needed them. So...I ordered another set of them. I will definitely let others know how good they are. And I received them in a a timely manner. Thank you:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have ordered these from the same company. I love that they give you such a nice selection of color frames. Thank you for making reading easier for me.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Pape

customer_reviews.title: A really exciting “find”
customer_reviews.text: I had NO expectations for this quality when I ordered - these are terrific. The quality, comfort and design of these glasses is a pleasant surprise! These are a great value and comparable to readers I’ve bought at $12-15 a pair. So excited about finding this vendor. I had no expectations of this quality! They’re so cute, fit comfortably, and are well-made. T
customer_reviews.author: PatS

customer_reviews.title: Great Eye Wear!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! They're cute, colorful, light weight and fits in the pocket of my purse. I've shared them with friends and they live it too. Thank you for a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mahina

customer_reviews.title: Buy these glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought these. Four pairs are exactly what I would have chosen out of a box of options. I would have passed up the bright pink and sunglasses, but I've worn the pink ones as much as the others...I ended up loving them. These are much better made than the cheap ones I normally buy. I'll probably go back and order some of the other sets. I like to have options. They would have been worth it at twice the price...or more.
customer_reviews.author: Michele M

customer_reviews.title: I received 6 good optic readers with 1 for outdoor reading
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with these 6 pairs of readers. For the price I normally pay for 1 or 2, I received 6 good optic readers with 1 for outdoor reading. The spring hinges allow for comfortable fit and slide on top of head. They arrived well packaged and I really like the various designs and colors. I go through a lot of readers at home, travel, and work so this set is perfect and cost effective for me to continue purchasing when needed.
customer_reviews.author: JoLa

customer_reviews.title: Cute, sturdy, economical-- a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal. The glasses arrived and look exactly as pictured in the photo. While they are not fancy, they are of decent quality and seem pretty sturdy. The springs in the hinges seem strong enough. The variety of designs is fabulous-- very cute. I am thrilled to have a pair I can wear in the sun (reading in a beach chair!). I am very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LES

customer_reviews.title: Not what was pictured
customer_reviews.text: The product I received is not what is pictured in the site. I very specifically wanted glasses with more substantial arms and that is not these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchel Malatek

customer_reviews.title: perfect! high quality!
customer_reviews.text: seller sent screwdriver, extra screws, wipe cloth along with the 6 wonderful, high quality glasses! rec'd in less than 2 days and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: halfpoet

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love the various styles and always get compliments! I recommend buying cases since I'm always bad and throw them in my purse and they get scratched up. At this low price I just buy more!
customer_reviews.author: APruitt

customer_reviews.title: great fir & wonderful mix
customer_reviews.text: i love these! it had alot of choice so i can now have them all over & dont end up looking for just 1 pair that i like...i like them all! the sunglasses can in so handy for me!! theres days that any amount of sun hurts my eyes so i can wear these inside & it works like a charm! thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and service.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and service. They even included a free mini-screwdriver and cleaning cloth. This is my third order, not because of the quality but because I frequently fall asleep reading and lay on them. At this price point, that’s not an issue. Highly recommend. And they are really cute, as well.
customer_reviews.author: RobinO

customer_reviews.title: Great selection of inexpensive readers
customer_reviews.text: I love the color selection and the extra sunglasses that come in the box. I’ve been using these readers for about a week now, and my only complaint is that they fall off my head when I push them up like a headband to get them off my face quickly. I wish they were just a little tighter so they would stay on top. Otherwise, I’m very happy so far
customer_reviews.author: JCWalton

customer_reviews.title: Snazzy peepers
customer_reviews.text: I received different glasses than those depicted here. But THEY ARE GREAT. Beautiful variety of colors/patterns. Good quality. Nice, comfy fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I'm always losing my readers so I bought this pack in order to leave a pair at each location I would normally need them. On my nightstand, in the kitchen near my mounted ipad to read recipes, next to my dog's diabetic supplies to check his blood glucose, at work, in my purse and in the car. They fit perfectly. I would repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ta2kitty

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Much sturdier than I expected. Good quality, look good, better than any found in stores. Great product, especially considering price. Would recommend to anyone who needs readers.
customer_reviews.author: CLP

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I only have a few pair that have not broken in the same spot. The frame breaks and the lenses pop out. I am not happy about this. I gave a good review before they started breaking. I will not purchase these again. What a rip off!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Howard

customer_reviews.title: but I wouldn't recommend for men in general
customer_reviews.text: It stinks to be over forty and actually need these in order to, well, read anything less than size 18 font. I get a lot of compliments on the pink ones for style, and on all of them from my children because when I wear them, the kids are off the hook for reading the cooking instructions on packages. My very manly husband sometimes borrows a pair, but I wouldn't recommend for men in general.
customer_reviews.author: Almost a Hermit Thanks to Online Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality readers
customer_reviews.text: The readers came on time, well packaged, and are good quality. I ordered the 1.25 strength and they were a perfect match for my computer and leisure reading needs. I liked to variety of colors and the sunglasses will come in handy while driving and navigating with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Helios and Neaira

customer_reviews.title: Regarding loose screws
customer_reviews.text: Regarding the issue of loose screws, I checked all six pair when they arrived. Most were very tight, a couple of hinges needed slight tightening, and one of the pairs of glasses had stripped screw holes on both sides, so they couldn't really be tightened. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Roquie

customer_reviews.title: I can see!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd set of reading glasses I have bought from this company because I always seem to misplace them around the house. Great stylish readers and super quick shipping. I can now see what I'm reading close up. Can't beat the price, either!
customer_reviews.author: apinkribbonsurvivor

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE, QUALITY AND STYLE!
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT. They are good quality, a little heavier than the drugstore kind, and snap closed very nicely. The colors are cute and trendy! I was always searching for my one pair, and contantly losing them, so having 6 is awesome! Great price, considering they charge from $10-20 a pair, in most retail outlets! Also, I bough them in 2.25 which is the strength I need and VERY hard to find in any drugstore for some reason. And the seller considerately addded a sunglass pair. I was very pleased to find these on Amazon. Five stars all around! I DID NOT RECEIVE ANY FREE PRODUCT OR DISCOUNT FOR THIS HONEST REVIEW!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses and style, to fit my attires....they works well with my contact lenses for reading close up.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great design.
customer_reviews.text: The readers I received were as pictured. I loved all the colors and they feel of good quality. They fit comfortably and stay on when I have to look down. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Sassycat

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases i ever made!
customer_reviews.text: One of my best purchases! I just turned 50, about 2 years ago, i noticed I couldn't see small print. So I got myself "cheaters". I lost them constantly (sometimes on my own head! Lol). Now I have a pair for my purse, desk, car, bedroom side table, and of course my head! Lol They are great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE NOT AS ADVERTISED!!!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were not as described, lens are way to small. Hard to see. Seller did not mention that a return would not be possible. I feel like I’ve wasted my money on these cheap reading glasses. I’m a prime member and Amazon resolution to this problem is non existent, bec if the pandemic. Amazon as well has an obligation to its members to have a way of contacting a rep for advice... UGH! Don’t purchase from this seller BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trisie

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and good value.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stylish reading glasses, the price is so good. I leave them all over the house and gave a couple of pairs to a friend. I just ordered another set, our young dog took a pair and a stepped on a pair. These are a good set of inexpensive glasses, I give a couple to other people. I need 2.0.and can just fine with them, they are obviously for close up reading and tasks like that.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Heuchan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality reading glasses and so reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Great quality reading glasses and so reasonably priced. They fit well and the lenses are very good. I have glasses everywhere I need them now and have discarded all the sorry old ones I've accumulated over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Nonna Nina

customer_reviews.title: Not to be worn on your head
customer_reviews.text: I like the price, look, style and comfort of these glasses. If you wear you cheaters on your head a lot, these are not for you. They fall off slide if etc. Invest in some of the holder things that hold them around your neck.
customer_reviews.author: lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, great readers!! Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! Looks good! With so many colors to pick from I have a pair to match all of my outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Jay j

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it........and cute too.
customer_reviews.text: These were surprisingly well made. I have prescription glasses and these get used way more around my house. I would definitely order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for reading glasses. I can leave a pair in different places that I need them and always have a pair handy! I only wish there was an option without the sunglasses as I don't read outside and finally just gave them away.
customer_reviews.author: R. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Finally, we have a pair of reading glasses whatever room we are in!
customer_reviews.text: What a fun (and practical) purchase. In the past the hubby and I have spent WAAAY too much trying to hunt down a pair of reading glasses. It seems they make all print too small to read these days. With this purchase (yes, you really get 6 pairs) I was able to leave a pair in nearly every room. There is even a pair of sunglass reading glasss for when we are on the deck. They are sturdy and colorful and I must admit when my husband puts a pair on it makes me giggle! Great price - great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Readers
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying the variety and quality of these readers. Good hinges, substantial sides (not thin or wobbly) clear lenses and overall impressive weight. Took four pair on a recent trip, ended up lending one to a friend who broke her prescription glasses. She was impressed, too. Don't hesitate to order.
customer_reviews.author: cdsacramento

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses! They are sturdy and strong - I will buy more! 5.12.17 - I take my original review back - while the glasses work fantastic - every pair of the glasses have broken after less than a month of use - very disappointing - The frames are cute and do not last
customer_reviews.author: Terrie A Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Great readers
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing these glasses. I like to have readers everywhere so that I always have a pair on hand. They have been very durable and are super cute. I purchased another set as I seem to loose them and just wanted to have more on hand. I've also shared a few pair with friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Anne Reinheimer

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase
customer_reviews.text: They were delivered as promised. The different styles look very nice. It comes with a cleaning cloth. They seem sturdy so far. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DeQueen12

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are awesome!! My eyesight is starting to go down the drain, and now I keep a pair in every corner, and they are better than any other glasses I bought at the store for a few bucks, and they fit great! I always had the problem with the "cheap" reading glasses that the lens would hit my eye lashes, and with these I don't have that problem. And they are also much sturdier and not as flimsy. Great product for the value!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Me
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I ordered this brand. Last time was several years ago. Inexpensive and held up to a lot. Cute style as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kris C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Find!
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled! Was having a terrible time not being able to find +2.25 readers in the stores so decided to check Amazon. I also was tired of wire frames and was looking for light weight plastic. These glasses have a nice spring action so I didn't have to worry that they would be too small or too large. Having the sunglasses are a HUGE bonus. Glad I read the reviews on Amazon. I consider this to be one of my better finds and I have told all my friends and co-workers about them!
customer_reviews.author: Chicago born

customer_reviews.title: Great readers
customer_reviews.text: Have bought these a few times for myself and bought more for friends and family -- love them
customer_reviews.author: PamM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great! i have seen more expensive ones that are not made as well as these.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Great price for reading glasses
customer_reviews.text: Like the 5 different color of glasses. Also got a pair that are sunglasses. Great buy at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: bap

customer_reviews.title: Love the different frames
customer_reviews.text: Leave my readers scattered around so they are available when I need them. Love the different frames, fit nicely and can see very clearly.Will order again when I need more. Also like the sunglass pair, can leave on the lani to use when outside.
customer_reviews.author: beshee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice design and fit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design and fit. I bought these for a friend and she goes through several pairs of readers a year. These seem to be good quality and look like they will hold up nicely. The added bonus of the sunglasses is very nice. 6 pairs for $15 is a pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: michael j archer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Some people had complained that these were cheaply made, but I thought, for the price, you get what you paid for, and I'm fine with that. However, I don't find them to be cheaply made at all! They are perfect for what I needed them for. At this price I have a pair by the couch, by my bed, at work, in my purse, etc. The colors are fun, and the bonus of the tinted readers is wonderful. I can read outside again! Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love that although light they are not flimsy, the colors are great and the extra 😎 are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Matilda

customer_reviews.title: I love these reader glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these reader glasses. I was always searching for my glasses, so glad I bought these! No longer have to search....I can keep a pair in every room as well as my purse and car. The price was much cheaper than going to a department store to purchase them individually. Love all the colors and patterns as well...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality readers
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Very sturdy with hinges that open out and all of them are very cute. I find i need stronger ones for certain reading so am going to order another set for that. I have them all over the house so they are handy. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: K Morey

customer_reviews.title: Slides down nose, falls off head
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a small head, so for me to have issues with these staying on says something. They slide down my nose if I'm looking down. And if I put them on top of my head, and I move my head at all, they fall off. Horrible. Don't waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.author: SPCinci

customer_reviews.title: Stylish bargain
customer_reviews.text: I don’t always write reviews but these cute glasses are a real bargain. I previously purchased one pair retail that are exactly like one of these five pair. I purchased them at a cute beach botique. I really like having multiple pairs... one for my purse, one by the bed. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Snowbabe

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are great glasses. Pros: Great price and I need a lot of them because I leave them all over the house and at work. Very stylish and I have had lots of compliments. Con: only 1 but it did not impact my rating. I do not use the sunglass readers but maybe others would. The only thing is I may not by another 6 pack as the sunglass reader would be a waste for me.
customer_reviews.author: JES

customer_reviews.title: Stylish but Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought a set of these at 3.0 and loved them--funky colors, long-lasting, and I could see out of them. My doctor later advised that I really needed 4.0, so I bought 4 more sets at 4.0. As soon as I put them on, I knew something was wrong. I could see okay through the left lens but everything was distorted through the right. I put on pair after pair, box after box, and they were all like that. No quality control whatsoever. There was no way both lenses were 4.0.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Bennett Hallenstein

customer_reviews.title: Love them all
customer_reviews.text: Love them all. I keep a pair in my purse. One pair sits by the computer and another in my upstairs sewing studio. The screws holding the eyepiece kept working loose on one pair so I put a drop of Super Glue on all the screws and never had that problem again.
customer_reviews.author: Tx quilter

customer_reviews.title: Great Readers
customer_reviews.text: These are great readers! They fit well, and they are not heavy. I would recommend these to anyone looking to buy readers!! I also love, love, love the reader sunglasses!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great readers
customer_reviews.text: I am always losing my glasses. These fit perfectly and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany ellis

customer_reviews.title: What a great deal! ONE pair at Walgreens costs the same ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal! ONE pair at Walgreens costs the same as all SIX of these together. I will never buy cheaters in the retail store again 😁
customer_reviews.author: Barb Johannsen

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this little set of glasses
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little set of glasses! They are lightweight also flexible to where you can put them on your ears comfortably , Without messing up your hair! Very cute and goes with all my outfits
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great price for 6 pairs of glasses. Fit great and does help With not being as tired when on my tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value. i have several pairs stashed around the ...
customer_reviews.text: great value. i have several pairs stashed around the house and everywhere i go so I am never searching for a pair of glasses when i need them.
customer_reviews.author: melissad65

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction. Thick plastic. Was a bit cautious about ordering online, but quality was good as well as fit. A lot of glasses can be a bit too large, but these ones fit me well. Will order these again if I lose any or need to increase magnification.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Like it but
customer_reviews.text: I like the glasses - they seem to be of good quality and the colors are good. I can't give it 5 stars because I ordered 2.50 but I cannot focus/read very well with them. My last glasses (a few weeks ago were purchased at CVS for a lot more money) were a 2.50 and they were fine. I don't want to give up on these glasses so I placed another order in 2.75 and hope they will be a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: GPJ

customer_reviews.title: I like the selection
customer_reviews.text: I like the selection. The glasses performed as expected. But you have to understand what you are buying. These are not your fabulous readers that you treat like gold. This is a pack of low cost readers. The magnification was accurate, the eye glass was clear and the styles were cute. These are cheap glasses. But I put a pair everywhere I could possibly need to read something. As a matter of fact, considering getting another set. If I lose them or break them, no big deal. I previousl y purchased another set for a similar price. They were too cheap looking to be professional. Also ugly. Go ahead and get them.
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Color are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses! I lose my glasses or they never seem to be where I need them. So ordering more works great for me! This is my second order in two years because I love the quality and colors. I was really happy to be able to look up my last order on Amazon and reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Newwalkerdo

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Glasses were delivered promptly and fit perfectly. Even got a couple little extras, a cloth to clean and a mini screwdriver for repairs.
customer_reviews.author: vik

customer_reviews.title: Second  order, they're  perfect !
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could find where I put them ! Have ordered them before and loved them, had several in all the places I needed them but they start to disappear and pretty soon I don't know where they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... six pairs lens frames are not black which I like. I don't look great with thick black frames ...
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of the six pairs lens frames are not black which I like. I don't look great with thick black frames around the lenses. They have pretty designs on the sides but that is not what you see when talking to someone. I put the blacked framed ones in the kitchen to use when cooking and in the glove box and use the pretty ones when going to dinner or at work. Not sure when I would use the sunglass pair as I need the light to see the print. Those do not need to be in the pack of six. Overall they are very study glasses and not flimsy along with a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ehrlich

customer_reviews.title: Summer Readers with Style
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted some reading glasses since her expensive prescription glasses broke. Searching Amazon we came upon these glasses. She liked them because they looked cute. When they arrived, they were just as cute as pictured. Not to mention they also are quite good reading glasses. The bonus is the fifth pair reading shades for reading outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Locovore

customer_reviews.title: Cute and effective for my distance vision
customer_reviews.text: I really like these glasses. My vision might be odd. These glasses, I actually wear for distance. So, when I don't feel like contacts, I can wear these. That's why I bought a package with sunglasses. These are very cute and effective.
customer_reviews.author: J. P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fashionistas
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and provide lots of color options for coordinating with my wardrobe. I also like that I can put them on top of my head without worrying about them becoming tangled in my hair. Optically, they are fine. I don't think they'll hold up to my abuse for more than 6 months to a year but that's my fault for not putting them in a case, pulling them on and off all day long, losing them in my purse, etc. Can't really beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Denise C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great Readers
customer_reviews.text: I love the spring hinge, great quality, and love the different colors and designs.
customer_reviews.author: DDR

customer_reviews.title: Great Readers at Awesome Price
customer_reviews.text: These are great readers and good variety on the patterns. Shipment was extraordinarily fast and they arrived with cleaning cloth and eyeglass tool which I did not expect. Definitely will be buying more as I misplace my readers all the time and these are better priced than ones in supermarkets.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Gross

customer_reviews.title: One for every room
customer_reviews.text: I need a pair of readers in every room because I can never find them. This works, with bonus of one is sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Watt Jr.

product_meta.title: Gamma Ray Women's Reading Glasses - 5 Pairs Flex Hinge Fashion Readers for Women
feature_bullets: 6 Pairs of Womens Readers at 1 Low Price
Keep a Pair in Each of Your Favorite Reading Area
